title: Introducing El Dollop!
itunes:title: Introducing El Dollop!
description:
El Dollop, part of All Things Comedy Network, is a bilingual podcast of American history in which every week host Eduardo Espinosa, will tell a historical event to co-host, José Antonio Badía who has no idea what the topic will be about. The Spanish version of "The Dollop with Dave Anthony and Gareth Reynolds".


Subscribe!

Apple Podcast

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/el-dollop/id1501444997


Spotify

https://open.spotify.com/show/5o5VNgyXWpa1161ppev6ml?si=IiFU8FmnRte7ydzddddEeA
